forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 13 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of downtown San Francisco today, the sun bathes the skyline in a soft, golden glow, inviting the gentle breeze to weave through the city streets. With temperatures climbing to a pleasant 70, you’ll find seniors and children alike gathering in parks and along the waterfront, their laughter mixing with the distant hum of city life. The west-southwest winds swirl and dance, reaching up to 16 mph, playfully tousling hair and flapping light clothing as the city embraces yet another clear day. There’s a delightful clarity to the atmosphere, unmarred by fog, allowing spectacular views across the bay. 

As dusk approaches, expect a cooling descent to around 54 degrees, the light turning to a softer palette as the sun begins to retreat. The winds will maintain their lively spirit, whispering through the trees and bringing with them the promise of a pleasantly cool evening. For those venturing out, layers will be best—perhaps a light sweater to flutter around your shoulders as you stroll through the heralded streets or sit back and watch the sunset cast its vibrant reflections upon the water. With such magnificent weather, a simple walk along the Embarcadero or a cozy evening enjoying a local café feels utterly ideal, nurturing both body and soul in this remarkable city by the bay.
